name: Perfect Gear
description:
Fantastic graphics, exquisite cars, in-depth customization, and a robust storyline.
Perfect Gear offers diverse content with simple controls.
The fun of challenging complex courses and the pleasure of racing to the top await you!


■ High Quality, 3D Graphic Supercars
From popular sports cars with superior handling to strong and powerful Euro trucks.
Over 100 models of exquisitely designed, No. 1 supercars.
Release your inner racing instincts and experience unlimited speed.

■ Real Racing on Diverse Tracks
Neon light-filled downtowns, beautiful circuits along the beach, and off-roads under the scorching sun.
All places imaginable have been altered into intense racing circuits.
Heat up the realistic asphalt with your vehicles.
Set a record tonight with your fierce racing and become an underground legend.

■ New Control Standards! Finger Drift System
A perfect car racer has no need for many skills.
Presenting console-level satisfaction with simple controls through Perfect Gear's Finger Drift.
Show off your perfect drifting and explosive nitro skills with smart, one hand grip controls!

■ Diverse, Never Before Experienced Content
Not just ranked lap time battles! Experience other high quality, diverse content.
Track races with beautiful backgrounds! Enjoy sunny days, rainy nights, and other different environments.
Race against the ghost car racer! Try to beat Rival or Clan member records.
Set new records with daily missions and gain car upgrade rewards.
Neck-and-neck between 5 car racers! Win in multiplayer and gain new cars.
Dispatch cars on part-time jobs. Even when you take a break, the race goes on.
Challenge yourself in the Grand Prix mode. World Grand Prix offers more valuable rewards.
Actively cooperate with the police and try to catch the wanted cars! Get rewards according to difficulty.
Enjoy the faultless world of Perfect Gear and original stories through its NPCs.

■ Car Customization System
Gather parts and upgrade your cars as if they were real to achieve the best performance.
Equip different unique racer chips for extra stats to enhance car performance.
Collect different cars to shift to higher gears or break the limit.
Paint the cars collected in your garage with different colors to express your individuality.
